name: Wicked Witches (itch)
description:
Members: Apoorv Taneja, John Santana, Ivan Restrepo, Ivonne Medina, Quincy Michels, Josh Anaya-Paiero, Pablo Moctezuma

Made for BC Game Jam 2022, with the theme Chain Reaction.

All assets used are either made in-house or used fairly under a creative commons license :)

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse/LMB - Aim/Shoot

Enjoy!
